subject: Re: Simsonn Order Enquiry #SSN1748
description_text:
I will gladly order in the future but there is a big bill i need to pay, so i need to cancel everything at the moment. As soon as i got more money i will order from you again. Kind regards Tim Schütte On 16. Jun 2025, at 11:22, General and sales enquiries <service@simsonn.com> wrote: ﻿ Hi, please ask why you want to cancel and if there are any problems we will try to help you. 
 
 Tim Schütte<tim.schuette19@icloud.com> 在 2025年6月16日 周一 17:20 写道： 
Hello, no problem i just want it cancelled. Regards Tim Schütte On 16. Jun 2025, at 11:19, SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote: ﻿
 
 
 
 
 



 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 SIMSONN
 
 

 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Hello, the Pro Plus-P3-H3 / Black you purchased is out of stock at our German warehouse, can we ship you a replacement Pro Plus-P3-H3 / Sliver or will we ship it to you from China. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at service@simsonn.com

conversations.body_text: ID 号为 488 和 489 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单488  
      主题: Order #SSN1748 Cancellation  
      描述:  Hello,  
 
   
 sadly i need to cancel the order #SSN1748. 
 
   
 Kind regards  
 
   
 Tim Schütte

合并来自工单489  
      主题: Re: Simsonn Order Enquiry #SSN1748  
      描述:  Hello, 
   
 no problem i just want it cancelled. 
   
 Regards  
   
 Tim Schütte  
 
 
  On 16. Jun 2025, at 11:19, SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com> wrote:  
 
 
  ﻿
  
  
  
  
  



  
    
      

         
          
  

     
      

        
          

             

              
                

                   
                       
                        SIMSONN
                       
                   

                
              


             
          
        


      
     
  



          
  

     
      
        
          

             
              
             Hello, the Pro Plus-P3-H3 / Black you purchased is out of stock at our German warehouse, can we ship you a replacement Pro Plus-P3-H3 / Sliver or will we ship it to you from China. 

             
          
        

      
     
  


          
  

     
      
        
          

             
              
               If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at service@simsonn.com
Hi Tim Schütte,     Your order has already been marked as delivered, so we’re unable to cancel it. Orders that have not yet been shipped can typically be canceled.
No that can’t be because I don’t live in the US also my order is from yesterday Regards Tim Schütte
Hi Tim Schütte,     Sorry, our staff found the wrong order, please don't worry, we will ask our webmaster to refund you tomorrow.
Hello, any news regarding the cancellation? Kind regards Tim Schütte
Hi Tim Schütte,     We've processed your refund. Please check.
